products.title: Kaleidoscope Deluxe, Scarlet High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Scarlet is an enticing shade of red that welcomes you in to put your feet up and rest easy. By combining a unique ribbon ladder with an immaculately polished surface that shimmers in the light we have created something a little special that will add a deluxe touch to any room in the home. Turn the living room into the colourful and relaxing space you have always wanted it to be by pairing scarlet with some cobalt blue walls and wooden flooring.

products.title: Deluxe Primary Red Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: Perfect fit venetian blinds are manufactured from high quality aluminium. Available in 42 colour shades. Deluxe primary red perfect fit blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Mabel Berry
products.description: Min width: 300mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 79% polyester 13% cotton 8% linen guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: ivory poly cotton lining as standard, white blackout lining and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 30mm wide x 43mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.
